pr_title: CLDR-14175 JSON: threaded conversion, improve coverage

puts out a little status indicator as to how many locales have been read.

timeline.message:
CLDR-14175 threaded JSON conversion

- also correct missing additional data items such as characterLabels and typographic
- new files: misc/typographic.json, misc/characterLabels.json
